official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of outpatient parenteral antimicrobial therapy under part B of the Medicare Program.
short_title: Medicare Coverage of Infectious Diseases Therapy Act of 1997
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Medicare Coverage of Infectious Diseases Therapy Act of 1997 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage of antimicrobials administered to patients parenterally. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish practice guidelines for the appropriate use of such antimicrobials.
